vehicles.description: One dark-colored SUV directly ahead in the same lane, appearing to be braking as indicated by the illuminated brake lights.
vehicles.explanation: The ego car must maintain a safe following distance and be prepared to stop or slow down if the SUV reduces speed or stops.

vehicles.description: Several parked cars on the left side of the road, parallel to the curb.
vehicles.explanation: The ego car should be cautious of the possibility of doors opening or pedestrians emerging from between parked vehicles.

vulnerable_road_users.description: There are no pedestrians, cyclists, or motorcyclists visible in the image.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: No immediate action required, but the ego car should remain alert for possible vulnerable road users not visible in the image.

traffic signs.description: A blue rectangular sign on the right side of the road appears to show a parking area or a facility nearby.
traffic signs.explanation: This sign does not immediately affect the driving behavior but serves as informational.

traffic lights.description: No traffic lights are visible in the image.
traffic lights.explanation: The ego car should continue to observe the road for traffic lights at upcoming intersections.

traffic cones.description: Orange traffic cones are set up on the right edge of the road, indicating a work zone or a roadside incident.
traffic cones.explanation: The cones suggest caution and that the ego car should be prepared to adjust its lane position slightly to the left if needed to maintain a safe distance from the work area or incident.

barriers.description: There is a series of barriers to the right side of the road demarcating the boundary of the driving lane and a work zone or non-traversable area.
barriers.explanation: These barriers indicate that the right side lane may be closed or restricted, and emphasize that the ego car should remain in the current lane.

other objects.description: There are two road lamps and an overhead line pole on the sidewalk to the right.
other objects.explanation: These objects do not influence the driving behavior as they are located well away from the roadway.

other objects.description: A white pavement marking possibly indicating a sensor or measurement tool on the road directly in front of the ego car
other objects.explanation: Although this object does not directly impact driving behavior, the ego car should be aware of it and avoid making unnecessary maneuvers.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image, there is one dark-colored SUV directly ahead in the same lane as the ego car, showing signs of braking with illuminated brake lights. The ego car must keep a safe distance and be ready to slow down or stop if the SUV changes speed. Additionally, there are several parked cars on the left side of the road, parallel to the curb. The ego car needs to be cautious of potential doors opening or pedestrians stepping out from between these vehicles.

Although there are no pedestrians, cyclists, or motorcyclists visible, the ego car should stay alert for any that may not be visible in the image. A blue rectangular sign on the right indicates a parking area or facility nearby, which is informational and does not immediately affect driving behavior. No traffic lights are in view, so the ego car should keep an eye out for them at upcoming intersections.

Orange traffic cones are placed on the right edge of the road, signaling a work zone or roadside incident, prompting the ego car to be ready to adjust its lane position to the left if necessary. There is also a series of barriers on the right side of the road, marking the boundary of the driving lane and a work zone or non-traversable area, indicating that the right lane may be closed or restricted and that the ego car should stay in its current lane.

Other objects include two road lamps and an overhead line pole on the sidewalk to the right, which do not affect driving behavior as they are far from the roadway. There is also a white pavement marking in front of the ego car, possibly a sensor or measurement tool, which should be noted by the ego car without making unnecessary maneuvers.

1.description and explanation: This is a traffic cone, typically used as a temporary traffic control device to guide vehicles around construction areas or other road obstructions. Drivers should steer clear of it to avoid damage to the vehicle or the cone.

2.description and explanation: This is a bollard, a sturdy post installed to control road traffic and prevent vehicles from entering certain areas. It's crucial for the ego car to maintain safe distance from the bollard to prevent collisions.

4.description and explanation: A bollard is situated on the side of the road, often used to control or direct road traffic. It serves as a visual barrier for drivers, making them aware of areas they should not enter with their vehicle. In this context, the bollard may indicate a section of the roadside that is off-limits for parking or driving, guiding the ego car to maintain its course within the designated traffic lanes.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a safe following distance from the SUV ahead, be cautious of the parked cars on the left for any unexpected movement, and stay attentive to any potential changes in road conditions or unexpected obstacles. Also, prepare to navigate past the traffic cones on the right side of the road by slightly adjusting the vehicle's position to the left within the lane if necessary, ensuring that it does not interfere with oncoming traffic. Drive attentively and anticipate changes in the traffic pattern. Since there are no visible traffic signs or lights, adhere to standard road rules until new traffic controls are in sight.
